channel.title: Talking npcs

item.title: Talking npcs
item.dc:creator: @Jordan011 Jordan011
item.description:
@Jordan011 wrote:

Hey guys i need some talking npcs and no i dont mean like text above there head. i mean you right click press talk and down in the text box there face shows up(doesnt need too) and text appears near it.

Im guessing you use an interface kinda like the appearance interface except a quest text interface.

Understand?

will give credit if i can get the thing upâ€¦

pls help! [br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 02:35:02 PM[/size]
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 02:44:38 PM[/size][hr]I made an example i just cant get the sheild to go away!!!else if (command.startsWith("go")) { sendFrame164(6253); stillgfx(200, absX, absY); sendFrame126("hey "+playerName+" this is a test", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations."); NpcDialogueSend = true; }
